data.prayer: Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of Kalimantan Timur, Indonesia.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kalimantan Timur, Indonesia
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 31 neighbors who are far from you in Kalimantan Timur. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 31 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, help the 23,684 believers in Kalimantan Timur to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the state of Kalimantan Timur access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Kayan, Mahakam people.
Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the state of Kalimantan Timur who will make disciples who make disciples.
Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the state of Kalimantan Timur, Indonesia.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Kalimantan Timur, Indonesia the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.
